                     <div class="line">you in the behalf of a good play! I am not</div>
                     <div class="line">furnished like a beggar, therefore to beg will not</div>
                     <div class="line">become me: my way is to conjure you; and I'll begin</div>
                     <div class="line">with the women. I charge you, O women, for the love</div>
                     <div class="line">you bear to men, to like as much of this play as</div>
                     <div class="line">please you: and I charge you, O men, for the love</div>
                     <div class="line">you bear to women--as I perceive by your simpering,</div>
                     <div class="line">none of you hates them--that between you and the</div>
                     <div class="line">women the play may please. If I were a woman I</div>
                     <div class="line">would kiss as many of you as had beards that pleased</div>
                     <div class="line">me, complexions that liked me and breaths that I</div>
                     <div class="line">defied not: and, I am sure, as many as have good</div>
                     <div class="line">beards or good faces or sweet breaths will, for my</div>
                     <div class="line">kind offer, when I make curtsy, bid me farewell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>
      <script src="../../resources/js/prism.js"/>
   </body>
</html>
<html>
   <head>
      <link href="../../resources/css/db-prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/default.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/publishers.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <meta charset="utf-8"/>
      <meta content="DocBook XSL 2.0 Stylesheets Vxxx" name="generator"/>
      <script src="../../resources/js/dbmodnizr.js" type="text/javascript"/>
      <title>As You Like It</title>
   </head>
   <body>
      <article class="book" id="R.1">
         <header class="book-titlepage">
            <h1>As You Like It</h1>
         </header>
         <div class="lists-of-titles">
            <div class="toc">

               </p>
               <ul class="toc">

                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>

         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE SENIOR, living in banishment.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE FREDERICK, his brother, an usurper of his dominions.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">AMIENS</span>
                              <span class="personname">JAQUES</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">lords attending on the banished duke.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LE BEAU, a courtier attending upon Frederick.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">CHARLES, wrestler to Frederick.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">OLIVER</span>
                              <span class="personname">JAQUES   </span>
                              <span class="personname">ORLANDO</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">sons of Sir Rowland de Boys.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">ADAM</span>
                              <span class="personname">DENNIS</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">servants to Oliver.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">TOUCHSTONE, a clown.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIR OLIVER MARTEXT, a vicar.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">CORIN</span>
                              <span class="personname">SILVIUS</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">shepherds.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">WILLIAM, a country fellow in love with Audrey.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">A person representing HYMEN. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ROSALIND, daughter to the banished duke.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">CELIA, daughter to Frederick.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">PHEBE, a shepherdess.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">AUDREY, a country wench.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Lords, pages, and attendants, &c.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  Oliver's house; Duke Frederick's court; and the Forest of Arden.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Orchard of Oliver's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  Lawn before the Duke's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in the palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Orchard of Oliver's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ORLANDO and ADAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">As I remember, Adam, it was upon this fashion</div>
                              <div class="line">bequeathed me by will but poor a thousand crowns,</div>
                              <div class="line">and, as thou sayest, charged my brother, on his</div>
                              <div class="line">blessing, to breed me well: and there begins my</div>
                              <div class="line">sadness. My brother Jaques he keeps at school, and</div>
                              <div class="line">report speaks goldenly of his profit: for my part,</div>
                              <div class="line">he keeps me rustically at home, or, to speak more</div>
                              <div class="line">properly, stays me here at home unkept; for call you</div>
                              <div class="line">that keeping for a gentleman of my birth, that</div>
                              <div class="line">differs not from the stalling of an ox? His horses</div>
                              <div class="line">are bred better; for, besides that they are fair</div>
                              <div class="line">with their feeding, they are taught their manage,</div>
                              <div class="line">and to that end riders dearly hired: but I, his</div>
                              <div class="line">brother, gain nothing under him but growth; for the</div>
                              <div class="line">which his animals on his dunghills are as much</div>
                              <div class="line">bound to him as I. Besides this nothing that he so</div>
                              <div class="line">plentifully gives me, the something that nature gave</div>
                              <div class="line">me his countenance seems to take from me: he lets</div>
                              <div class="line">me feed with his hinds, bars me the place of a</div>
                              <div class="line">brother, and, as much as in him lies, mines my</div>
                              <div class="line">gentility with my education. This is it, Adam, that</div>
                              <div class="line">grieves me; and the spirit of my father, which I</div>
                              <div class="line">think is within me, begins to mutiny against this</div>
                              <div class="line">servitude: I will no longer endure it, though yet I</div>
                              <div class="line">know no wise remedy how to avoid it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Yonder comes my master, your brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go apart, Adam, and thou shalt hear how he will</div>
                              <div class="line">shake me up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter OLIVER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, sir! what make you here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing: I am not taught to make any thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">What mar you then, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, I am helping you to mar that which God</div>
                              <div class="line">made, a poor unworthy brother of yours, with idleness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, be better employed, and be naught awhile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I keep your hogs and eat husks with them?</div>
                              <div class="line">What prodigal portion have I spent, that I should</div>
                              <div class="line">come to such penury?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you where your are, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, very well; here in your orchard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you before whom, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, better than him I am before knows me. I know</div>
                              <div class="line">you are my eldest brother; and, in the gentle</div>
                              <div class="line">condition of blood, you should so know me. The</div>
                              <div class="line">courtesy of nations allows you my better, in that</div>
                              <div class="line">you are the first-born; but the same tradition</div>
                              <div class="line">takes not away my blood, were there twenty brothers</div>
                              <div class="line">betwixt us: I have as much of my father in me as</div>
                              <div class="line">you; albeit, I confess, your coming before me is</div>
                              <div class="line">nearer to his reverence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">What, boy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, elder brother, you are too young in this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou lay hands on me, villain?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no villain; I am the youngest son of Sir</div>
                              <div class="line">Rowland de Boys; he was my father, and he is thrice</div>
                              <div class="line">a villain that says such a father begot villains.</div>
                              <div class="line">Wert thou not my brother, I would not take this hand</div>
                              <div class="line">from thy throat till this other had pulled out thy</div>
                              <div class="line">tongue for saying so: thou hast railed on thyself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet masters, be patient: for your father's</div>
                              <div class="line">remembrance, be at accord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me go, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not, till I please: you shall hear me. My</div>
                              <div class="line">father charged you in his will to give me good</div>
                              <div class="line">education: you have trained me like a peasant,</div>
                              <div class="line">obscuring and hiding from me all gentleman-like</div>
                              <div class="line">qualities. The spirit of my father grows strong in</div>
                              <div class="line">me, and I will no longer endure it: therefore allow</div>
                              <div class="line">me such exercises as may become a gentleman, or</div>
                              <div class="line">give me the poor allottery my father left me by</div>
                              <div class="line">testament; with that I will go buy my fortunes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">And what wilt thou do? beg, when that is spent?</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, get you in: I will not long be troubled</div>
                              <div class="line">with you; you shall have some part of your will: I</div>
                              <div class="line">pray you, leave me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will no further offend you than becomes me for my good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Get you with him, you old dog.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Is 'old dog' my reward? Most true, I have lost my</div>
                              <div class="line">teeth in your service. God be with my old master!</div>
                              <div class="line">he would not have spoke such a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ORLANDO and ADAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it even so? begin you to grow upon me? I will</div>
                              <div class="line">physic your rankness, and yet give no thousand</div>
                              <div class="line">crowns neither. Holla, Dennis!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DENNIS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DENNIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Calls your worship?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Was not Charles, the duke's wrestler, here to speak with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DENNIS</div>
                              <div class="line">So please you, he is here at the door and importunes</div>
                              <div class="line">access to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Call him in.</div>
                              <p>Exit DENNIS</p>
                              <div class="line">'Twill be a good way; and to-morrow the wrestling is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CHARLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow to your worship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Monsieur Charles, what's the new news at the</div>
                              <div class="line">new court?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no news at the court, sir, but the old news:</div>
                              <div class="line">that is, the old duke is banished by his younger</div>
                              <div class="line">brother the new duke; and three or four loving lords</div>
                              <div class="line">have put themselves into voluntary exile with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">whose lands and revenues enrich the new duke;</div>
                              <div class="line">therefore he gives them good leave to wander.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Can you tell if Rosalind, the duke's daughter, be</div>
                              <div class="line">banished with her father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, no; for the duke's daughter, her cousin, so loves</div>
                              <div class="line">her, being ever from their cradles bred together,</div>
                              <div class="line">that she would have followed her exile, or have died</div>
                              <div class="line">to stay behind her. She is at the court, and no</div>
                              <div class="line">less beloved of her uncle than his own daughter; and</div>
                              <div class="line">never two ladies loved as they do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Where will the old duke live?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">They say he is already in the forest of Arden, and</div>
                              <div class="line">a many merry men with him; and there they live like</div>
                              <div class="line">the old Robin Hood of England: they say many young</div>
                              <div class="line">gentlemen flock to him every day, and fleet the time</div>
                              <div class="line">carelessly, as they did in the golden world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">What, you wrestle to-morrow before the new duke?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, do I, sir; and I came to acquaint you with a</div>
                              <div class="line">matter. I am given, sir, secretly to understand</div>
                              <div class="line">that your younger brother Orlando hath a disposition</div>
                              <div class="line">to come in disguised against me to try a fall.</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow, sir, I wrestle for my credit; and he that</div>
                              <div class="line">escapes me without some broken limb shall acquit him</div>
                              <div class="line">well. Your brother is but young and tender; and,</div>
                              <div class="line">for your love, I would be loath to foil him, as I</div>
                              <div class="line">must, for my own honour, if he come in: therefore,</div>
                              <div class="line">out of my love to you, I came hither to acquaint you</div>
                              <div class="line">withal, that either you might stay him from his</div>
                              <div class="line">intendment or brook such disgrace well as he shall</div>
                              <div class="line">run into, in that it is a thing of his own search</div>
                              <div class="line">and altogether against my will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Charles, I thank thee for thy love to me, which</div>
                              <div class="line">thou shalt find I will most kindly requite. I had</div>
                              <div class="line">myself notice of my brother's purpose herein and</div>
                              <div class="line">have by underhand means laboured to dissuade him from</div>
                              <div class="line">it, but he is resolute. I'll tell thee, Charles:</div>
                              <div class="line">it is the stubbornest young fellow of France, full</div>
                              <div class="line">of ambition, an envious emulator of every man's</div>
                              <div class="line">good parts, a secret and villanous contriver against</div>
                              <div class="line">me his natural brother: therefore use thy</div>
                              <div class="line">discretion; I had as lief thou didst break his neck</div>
                              <div class="line">as his finger. And thou wert best look to't; for if</div>
                              <div class="line">thou dost him any slight disgrace or if he do not</div>
                              <div class="line">mightily grace himself on thee, he will practise</div>
                              <div class="line">against thee by poison, entrap thee by some</div>
                              <div class="line">treacherous device and never leave thee till he</div>
                              <div class="line">hath ta'en thy life by some indirect means or other;</div>
                              <div class="line">for, I assure thee, and almost with tears I speak</div>
                              <div class="line">it, there is not one so young and so villanous this</div>
                              <div class="line">day living. I speak but brotherly of him; but</div>
                              <div class="line">should I anatomize him to thee as he is, I must</div>
                              <div class="line">blush and weep and thou must look pale and wonder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I am heartily glad I came hither to you. If he come</div>
                              <div class="line">to-morrow, I'll give him his payment: if ever he go</div>
                              <div class="line">alone again, I'll never wrestle for prize more: and</div>
                              <div class="line">so God keep your worship!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OLIVER</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, good Charles.</div>
                              <p>Exit CHARLES</p>
                              <div class="line">Now will I stir this gamester: I hope I shall see</div>
                              <div class="line">an end of him; for my soul, yet I know not why,</div>
                              <div class="line">hates nothing more than he. Yet he's gentle, never</div>
                              <div class="line">schooled and yet learned, full of noble device, of</div>
                              <div class="line">all sorts enchantingly beloved, and indeed so much</div>
                              <div class="line">in the heart of the world, and especially of my own</div>
                              <div class="line">people, who best know him, that I am altogether</div>
                              <div class="line">misprised: but it shall not be so long; this</div>
                              <div class="line">wrestler shall clear all: nothing remains but that</div>
                              <div class="line">I kindle the boy thither; which now I'll go about.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Lawn before the Duke's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CELIA and ROSALIND</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, Rosalind, sweet my coz, be merry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear Celia, I show more mirth than I am mistress of;</div>
                              <div class="line">and would you yet I were merrier? Unless you could</div>
                              <div class="line">teach me to forget a banished father, you must not</div>
                              <div class="line">learn me how to remember any extraordinary pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Herein I see thou lovest me not with the full weight</div>
                              <div class="line">that I love thee. If my uncle, thy banished father,</div>
                              <div class="line">had banished thy uncle, the duke my father, so thou</div>
                              <div class="line">hadst been still with me, I could have taught my</div>
                              <div class="line">love to take thy father for mine: so wouldst thou,</div>
                              <div class="line">if the truth of thy love to me were so righteously</div>
                              <div class="line">tempered as mine is to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will forget the condition of my estate, to</div>
                              <div class="line">rejoice in yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You know my father hath no child but I, nor none is</div>
                              <div class="line">like to have: and, truly, when he dies, thou shalt</div>
                              <div class="line">be his heir, for what he hath taken away from thy</div>
                              <div class="line">father perforce, I will render thee again in</div>
                              <div class="line">affection; by mine honour, I will; and when I break</div>
                              <div class="line">that oath, let me turn monster: therefore, my</div>
                              <div class="line">sweet Rose, my dear Rose, be merry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">From henceforth I will, coz, and devise sports. Let</div>
                              <div class="line">me see; what think you of falling in love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, I prithee, do, to make sport withal: but</div>
                              <div class="line">love no man in good earnest; nor no further in sport</div>
                              <div class="line">neither than with safety of a pure blush thou mayst</div>
                              <div class="line">in honour come off again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall be our sport, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us sit and mock the good housewife Fortune from</div>
                              <div class="line">her wheel, that her gifts may henceforth be bestowed equally.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">I would we could do so, for her benefits are</div>
                              <div class="line">mightily misplaced, and the bountiful blind woman</div>
                              <div class="line">doth most mistake in her gifts to women.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true; for those that she makes fair she scarce</div>
                              <div class="line">makes honest, and those that she makes honest she</div>
                              <div class="line">makes very ill-favouredly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, now thou goest from Fortune's office to</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature's: Fortune reigns in gifts of the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">not in the lineaments of Nature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter TOUCHSTONE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No? when Nature hath made a fair creature, may she</div>
                              <div class="line">not by Fortune fall into the fire? Though Nature</div>
                              <div class="line">hath given us wit to flout at Fortune, hath not</div>
                              <div class="line">Fortune sent in this fool to cut off the argument?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, there is Fortune too hard for Nature, when</div>
                              <div class="line">Fortune makes Nature's natural the cutter-off of</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature's wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Peradventure this is not Fortune's work neither, but</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature's; who perceiveth our natural wits too dull</div>
                              <div class="line">to reason of such goddesses and hath sent this</div>
                              <div class="line">natural for our whetstone; for always the dulness of</div>
                              <div class="line">the fool is the whetstone of the wits. How now,</div>
                              <div class="line">wit! whither wander you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress, you must come away to your father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Were you made the messenger?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, by mine honour, but I was bid to come for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Where learned you that oath, fool?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Of a certain knight that swore by his honour they</div>
                              <div class="line">were good pancakes and swore by his honour the</div>
                              <div class="line">mustard was naught: now I'll stand to it, the</div>
                              <div class="line">pancakes were naught and the mustard was good, and</div>
                              <div class="line">yet was not the knight forsworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">How prove you that, in the great heap of your</div>
                              <div class="line">knowledge?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, now unmuzzle your wisdom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand you both forth now: stroke your chins, and</div>
                              <div class="line">swear by your beards that I am a knave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">By our beards, if we had them, thou art.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">By my knavery, if I had it, then I were; but if you</div>
                              <div class="line">swear by that that is not, you are not forsworn: no</div>
                              <div class="line">more was this knight swearing by his honour, for he</div>
                              <div class="line">never had any; or if he had, he had sworn it away</div>
                              <div class="line">before ever he saw those pancakes or that mustard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, who is't that thou meanest?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">One that old Frederick, your father, loves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My father's love is enough to honour him: enough!</div>
                              <div class="line">speak no more of him; you'll be whipped for taxation</div>
                              <div class="line">one of these days.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">The more pity, that fools may not speak wisely what</div>
                              <div class="line">wise men do foolishly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, thou sayest true; for since the little</div>
                              <div class="line">wit that fools have was silenced, the little foolery</div>
                              <div class="line">that wise men have makes a great show. Here comes</div>
                              <div class="line">Monsieur Le Beau.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">With his mouth full of news.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Which he will put on us, as pigeons feed their young.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Then shall we be news-crammed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">All the better; we shall be the more marketable.</div>
                              <p>Enter LE BEAU</p>
                              <div class="line">Bon jour, Monsieur Le Beau: what's the news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair princess, you have lost much good sport.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sport! of what colour?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">What colour, madam! how shall I answer you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">As wit and fortune will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Or as the Destinies decree.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said: that was laid on with a trowel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, if I keep not my rank,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou losest thy old smell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">You amaze me, ladies: I would have told you of good</div>
                              <div class="line">wrestling, which you have lost the sight of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">You tell us the manner of the wrestling.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">I will tell you the beginning; and, if it please</div>
                              <div class="line">your ladyships, you may see the end; for the best is</div>
                              <div class="line">yet to do; and here, where you are, they are coming</div>
                              <div class="line">to perform it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, the beginning, that is dead and buried.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">There comes an old man and his three sons,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I could match this beginning with an old tale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">Three proper young men, of excellent growth and presence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">With bills on their necks, 'Be it known unto all men</div>
                              <div class="line">by these presents.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">The eldest of the three wrestled with Charles, the</div>
                              <div class="line">duke's wrestler; which Charles in a moment threw him</div>
                              <div class="line">and broke three of his ribs, that there is little</div>
                              <div class="line">hope of life in him: so he served the second, and</div>
                              <div class="line">so the third. Yonder they lie; the poor old man,</div>
                              <div class="line">their father, making such pitiful dole over them</div>
                              <div class="line">that all the beholders take his part with weeping.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">But what is the sport, monsieur, that the ladies</div>
                              <div class="line">have lost?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this that I speak of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TOUCHSTONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus men may grow wiser every day: it is the first</div>
                              <div class="line">time that ever I heard breaking of ribs was sport</div>
                              <div class="line">for ladies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I, I promise thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">But is there any else longs to see this broken music</div>
                              <div class="line">in his sides? is there yet another dotes upon</div>
                              <div class="line">rib-breaking? Shall we see this wrestling, cousin?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">You must, if you stay here; for here is the place</div>
                              <div class="line">appointed for the wrestling, and they are ready to</div>
                              <div class="line">perform it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yonder, sure, they are coming: let us now stay and see it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Enter DUKE FREDERICK, Lords, ORLANDO,
CHARLES, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on: since the youth will not be entreated, his</div>
                              <div class="line">own peril on his forwardness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Is yonder the man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">Even he, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, he is too young! yet he looks successfully.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, daughter and cousin! are you crept hither</div>
                              <div class="line">to see the wrestling?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my liege, so please you give us leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">You will take little delight in it, I can tell you;</div>
                              <div class="line">there is such odds in the man. In pity of the</div>
                              <div class="line">challenger's youth I would fain dissuade him, but he</div>
                              <div class="line">will not be entreated. Speak to him, ladies; see if</div>
                              <div class="line">you can move him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Call him hither, good Monsieur Le Beau.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so: I'll not be by.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">Monsieur the challenger, the princesses call for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I attend them with all respect and duty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Young man, have you challenged Charles the wrestler?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, fair princess; he is the general challenger: I</div>
                              <div class="line">come but in, as others do, to try with him the</div>
                              <div class="line">strength of my youth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Young gentleman, your spirits are too bold for your</div>
                              <div class="line">years. You have seen cruel proof of this man's</div>
                              <div class="line">strength: if you saw yourself with your eyes or</div>
                              <div class="line">knew yourself with your judgment, the fear of your</div>
                              <div class="line">adventure would counsel you to a more equal</div>
                              <div class="line">enterprise. We pray you, for your own sake, to</div>
                              <div class="line">embrace your own safety and give over this attempt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, young sir; your reputation shall not therefore</div>
                              <div class="line">be misprised: we will make it our suit to the duke</div>
                              <div class="line">that the wrestling might not go forward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech you, punish me not with your hard</div>
                              <div class="line">thoughts; wherein I confess me much guilty, to deny</div>
                              <div class="line">so fair and excellent ladies any thing. But let</div>
                              <div class="line">your fair eyes and gentle wishes go with me to my</div>
                              <div class="line">trial: wherein if I be foiled, there is but one</div>
                              <div class="line">shamed that was never gracious; if killed, but one</div>
                              <div class="line">dead that was willing to be so: I shall do my</div>
                              <div class="line">friends no wrong, for I have none to lament me, the</div>
                              <div class="line">world no injury, for in it I have nothing; only in</div>
                              <div class="line">the world I fill up a place, which may be better</div>
                              <div class="line">supplied when I have made it empty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">The little strength that I have, I would it were with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">And mine, to eke out hers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare you well: pray heaven I be deceived in you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Your heart's desires be with you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, where is this young gallant that is so</div>
                              <div class="line">desirous to lie with his mother earth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ready, sir; but his will hath in it a more modest working.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall try but one fall.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CHARLES</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I warrant your grace, you shall not entreat him</div>
                              <div class="line">to a second, that have so mightily persuaded him</div>
                              <div class="line">from a first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">An you mean to mock me after, you should not have</div>
                              <div class="line">mocked me before: but come your ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Now Hercules be thy speed, young man!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I would I were invisible, to catch the strong</div>
                              <div class="line">fellow by the leg.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They wrestle</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">O excellent young man!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I had a thunderbolt in mine eye, I can tell who</div>
                              <div class="line">should down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Shout. CHARLES is thrown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">No more, no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, I beseech your grace: I am not yet well breathed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">How dost thou, Charles?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LE BEAU</div>
                              <div class="line">He cannot speak, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear him away. What is thy name, young man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Orlando, my liege; the youngest son of Sir Rowland de Boys.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE FREDERICK</div>
                              <div class="line">I would thou hadst been son to some man else:</div>
                              <div class="line">The world esteem'd thy father honourable,</div>
                              <div class="line">But I did find him still mine enemy:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shouldst have better pleased me with this deed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hadst thou descended from another house.</div>
                              <div class="line">But fare thee well; thou art a gallant youth:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would thou hadst told me of another father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DUKE FREDERICK, train, and LE BEAU</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Were I my father, coz, would I do this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ORLANDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am more proud to be Sir Rowland's son,</div>
                              <div class="line">His youngest son; and would not change that calling,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be adopted heir to Frederick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">My father loved Sir Rowland as his soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the world was of my father's mind:</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I before known this young man his son,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should have given him tears unto entreaties,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere he should thus have ventured.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentle cousin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us go thank him and encourage him:</div>
                              <div class="line">My father's rough and envious disposition</div>
                              <div class="line">Sticks me at heart. Sir, you have well deserved:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you do keep your promises in love</div>
                              <div class="line">But justly, as you have exceeded all promise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your mistress shall be happy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSALIND</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentleman,</div>
                              <p>Giving him a chain from her neck</p>
                              <div class="line">Wear this for me, one out of suits with fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">That could give more, but that her hand lacks means.</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we go, coz?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay. Fare you well, fair gentleman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
